The prevalence obesity increase develop develop country . There great need medicinal treatment effectively support life style change surgical procedure reduce maintain bodyweight . 7TM Pharma identify TM30339 clinical development candidate molecule potential assist control amelioration obesity human .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Obese male female BMI 3040 kg/m2 inclusive weight range 85 135 kg inclusive 2 . Age 1860 year inclusive 3 . Stable lifestyle e.g . smoking , exercise eating pattern time least 6 month , willing maintain habit course study 4 . Stable weight past 2 month i.e . change body weight < 3 kg report subject 1 . Subjects history allergy toward product contain natural rubber ( e.g . latex ) 2 . Subjects , history , clinically significant neurological , gastrointestinal ( include bariatric surgery ) , renal , hepatic , cardiovascular , psychiatric , respiratory , metabolic , endocrine , haematological , major disorder 3 . Subjects supine blood pressure screen Visit 1 high 150/95 mmHg repeat measurement within 15 minute 4 . Subjects QTc ( Bazett 's correction ) interval > 450 msec screen 5 . Subjects bradycardia ( heart rate < 50 ) 6 . Subjects heart block 7 . Clinically significant thyroid dysfunction evidence TSH > 1.5 X ULN
